UnitDefinition.Name: Hazard dose imputation method types
UnitDefinition.Description: Accepted Hazard dose imputation method types. Controlled terminology.

Unit.Name: Munro P5 (TTC approach)
Unit.Description: Use the P5 of the Munro NOEL collection.

Unit.Name: Munro central value
Unit.Description: Use an unbiased nominal value from the Munro NOEL collection; draw randomly from this collection in the uncertainty runs.

Unit.Name: Available hazard characterisations distribution P5
Unit.Description: Use the P5 of the available points of departure.

Unit.Name: Available hazard characterisations distribution central value
Unit.ShortName: Available hazard characterisations distribution central value
Unit.Description: Use an unbiased nominal value from the collection of available points of departure; draw randomly from this collection in the uncertainty runs.
